Name: Johanson-Blizzard syndrome
Synonyms_List__c: JBS, Nasal alar hypoplasia, hypothyroidism, pancreatic achylia and congenital deafness
Disease_Description__c: Johanson-Blizzard syndrome is an autosomal recessive disorder characterized by poor growth, mental retardation, and variable dysmorphic features, including aplasia or hypoplasia of the nasal alae, abnormal hair patterns or scalp defects, and oligodontia. Other features include hypothyroidism, sensorineural hearing loss, imperforate anus, and pancreatic exocrine insufficiency (summary by Al-Dosari et al., 2008).
